typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		HK_PROMOTION_ID as string,
		PROMOTION_ID as string,
		ITEM_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	query: 'SELECT hp.HK_PROMOTION_ID,hp.PROMOTION_ID,sp.ITEM_ID  FROM DataVaultDB.dbo.HUB_PROMOTION hp  \nINNER JOIN DataVaultDB.dbo.SAT_PROMOTION sp \non hp.HK_PROMOTION_ID = sp.HK_PROMOTION_ID  ',
	format: 'query') ~> AzureSQLHubPromotion
source(output(
		HK_ITEM_ID as string,
		ITEM_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQLHubItem
SelectData, AzureSQLHubItem join(SelectData@ITEM_ID == AzureSQLHubItem@ITEM_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinHubItemPromotion
AzureSQLHubPromotion select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectData
JoinHubItemPromotion derive(HK_L_ITEM_PROMOTION = md5(concat(HK_ITEM_ID,coalesce(PROMOTION_ID,'NA'))),
		LOAD_DTS = currentTimestamp(),
		REC_SRC = 'ITEM_INFO') ~> Expression
Expression sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		HK_L_ITEM_PROMOTION as string,
		HK_ITEM_ID as string,
		HK_PROMOTION_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HK_L_ITEM_PROMOTION,
		HK_ITEM_ID,
		HK_PROMOTION_ID,
		LOAD_DTS,
		REC_SRC
	)) ~> AzureSQLLnkItemPromotion
